message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $8,000. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to offer $9,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm confident it's a good deal for you as well. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still looking for a better deal. Considering the product's value to you is $8,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $11,000. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value to you, while also giving you a good deal. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,500 for the product. This is a fair price, and I believe it reflects the value of the product to both of us. I hope we can reach an agreement on this price.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more compromise. Considering your offer of $9,500, I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer the product to you for $10,200. This is a fair price that reflects the product's value to you, and I believe it's a good deal for both of us. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
